title: Google L5 Offer | Bengaluru
content:
Education: Tier 1 College
Years of Experience:8 YOE
Prior Experience: Microsoft L63
Date of the Offer: April-June 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L5
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 60L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 7L + 7L
Stock bonus:250K (62.5K/year)
Bonus: 15% of Salary
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~1.3cr
Benefits: Google Perks
Other details: PF, medical care etc. are extra perks.

Thank you Leetcode Community for this platform. Wouldn't have dont it without you.  :)

title: Microsoft L63 Bengaluru| Salesforce SMTS Hyderabad
content:
Education: B.Tech NIT
Years of Experience: 8 plus
Prior Experience: Fintech startup 
Previous Compensation: 57L (51 Base + 8K USD ESOPs - no IPO in near future)


Offers:

1. Salesforce
Team: Experience Cloud (starting a new team in India)
Date of the Offer: Oct '24
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Hyderabad
Base: 62 L
Joining Bonus: 5L
Relocation Bonus: 1.5L
Stock bonus: 100K USD 
Annual Bonus: 15% (9.3L)
Total comp (Salary + Annual Bonus + Stock + Joining Bonus): ~97.3L
Benefits: Standard


2. Company: Microsoft
Team: Edge Platforms
Date of the Offer: July '24
Title/Level: SSE L63
Location: Bengaluru
Base: 56 L
Joining Bonus: 5.6L (plus 5.6L second year retention bonus)
Relocation Bonus: ~7.25L
Stock bonus: 100K USD 
Annual Bonus: 0-30%, standard 15% - 8.4L
Total comp (Salary + Annual Bonus + Stock + Joining Bonus): ~91L
Benefits: Standard


Please suggest on:
1. If I should go back to MS with SF offer and negotiate? Which components could I negotiate on?
2. Looking for a balanced work life and growth, which company should I be joning based on your experience or second hand knowledge?
3. In my discussion with SF, manager mentioned expectation to work for a few hours during PST hours as the current team is based out of US, any thoughts on this?
4. If its a good idea to join MS as hybrid is not yet mandatory and can look for internal team transfers to MS Hyderabad?
5. In terms of tech stack and quality of work, which is a better choice?

Personally inclined towards SF because of location, but here to make an informed decision based on others inputs.

Thanks in advance.

title: Visa - SWE in bangalore
content:
Education: B.E from Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 2.10
Prior Experience: Developer in reputed SBC
Current CTC: 14 LPA
Date of the Offer: recently
Company: Visa
Title/Level: SE
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 19L
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: none
Bonus: 1.9L (10% of base)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 19L (base) + 1.9L (Bonus) + 1.6L (PF+gratutity) = 22.49L
Benefits: Visa standard benefits.
Other details: had another offer of similar range, after negotiation they came back with this number.

Verdict: This seems to be a very lowball offer. Please suggest

title: Walmart | IN4 (SSE) | Bangalore | Offer rejected
content:
Education: B.E from Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 8
Prior Experience: SSE II
Current comp: 48 LPA.
Date of the Offer: 25/09/2024
Company: Walmart
Title/Level: SSE / IN4
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 40L
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 9L RSU vesting in 3 years (25% of base) + One time RSU of 4.5L (vesting in 3 years)
Bonus: 8L (20% of base)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 40L (base) + 8L (Bonus) + 3L (RSU/Year) + 1.5L (RSU/Year. This is New Joinee RSU) = **52.5L**
Benefits: Walmart standard benefits.
Other details: NA

**Verdict:** *This seems to be a very lowball offer. Declined the offer as I have offers from Intuit and Oracle OCI with highr pay.*
